column3: Hi! I've {{c1::been}} to the shops. I've bought lots of things.
Sarah isn't here, and I don't know where she's {{c1::gone}}.
My parents are away on holiday. They've {{c1::gone}} to Italy.

A: Don't forget to go to the bank.
B: I've already {{c1::been}}.
Tom has {{c1::gone}} out. He'll be back in about an hour.
